title: Looks Like Firefox 116 Will Add HW Accelerated Video Playback for Raspberry Pi 4
description:
The upcoming Firefox 116 open-source web browser will add hardware-accelerated H.264 video playback for Raspberry Pi 4 devices.

The post Looks Like Firefox 116 Will Add HW Accelerated Video Playback for Raspberry Pi 4 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Proton 8.0-3 Is Out with Support for Propnight, Tom Clancy’s Ghost Recon Breakpoint
description:
Proton 8.0-3 compatibility tool for Steam Play is out with support for more Windows games to play on Linux, as well as various improvements. Here's what's new!

The post Proton 8.0-3 Is Out with Support for Propnight, Tom Clancy’s Ghost Recon Breakpoint appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
